headline: Sentiment down 775% this week, optimism declining
key_insights: Fears trending up 314% over 7 days (strong momentum)
sentiment_commentary:
• Frustrations explode with 158 quotes at a record-high score of 154.2, driven by 130 strong-intensity comments - people are extremely agitated today.

• This marks the highest frustration level in the entire 44-day period, nearly doubling from yesterday's already elevated reading.

• Fears also surged significantly while optimism remains deeply negative, showing broad-based discontent across Singapore social media.
methodology: See METHODOLOGY.md. Scores use z-score normalization with empirically-derived intensity weights from analytics_config.yaml. Alerts at |z| >= threshold (configurable, default 2.0 for p < 0.05).
